EmailTemplate.description: Notification to Approver that a form has been submitted for them to approve/reject.
EmailTemplate.name: Development Sandbox Request Submission Notification Template
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Forms__c.Form_Type__c}: "{!Forms__c.Name__c}" Submitted For Your Approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!ApprovalRequest.Process_Assignee},
A new request, {!Forms__c.Form_Type__c}: "{!Forms__c.Name__c}", has been submitted for your approval.
Thank you,
{!Approval_Requesting_User.Name}
